volumeInsights.title: Significant Hiring Increase
volumeInsights.description: 396% increase in postings compared to the previous period.

volumeInsights.title: Faster Hiring Cycles
volumeInsights.description: Application windows average 7 days shorter than market average.

volumeInsights.title: Total Postings
volumeInsights.description: 337 total job postings in this period.

competitiveInsights.title: Market Presence
competitiveInsights.description: 9.6% of total UN system job postings.

competitiveInsights.title: Market Ranking
competitiveInsights.description: Ranked #4 out of 29 agencies by hiring volume.

competitiveInsights.title: Below Peer Average
competitiveInsights.description: Hiring volume below peer group average.

strategicInsights.title: Strong Localization
strategicInsights.description: National staff positions (64%) exceed international positions (5%).

strategicInsights.title: Top Location
strategicInsights.description: Unspecified is the primary duty station with 9% of positions.

recommendations.rationale: Only 2% of positions are at senior level.
recommendations.impact: Stronger succession planning and organizational capability
